gameDetails.name: Potions
gameDetails.description: In Potions, everyone is a "wizarding" apprentice competing to become a wizard. The first apprentice to collect five Potion Class Credit Tokens wins. Players collect Potion Class Credit Tokens by being the first to obtain a set of cards that match the potion recipe as instructed by a roll of the potion dice. Watch out for other aspiring wizards – they will try to change the recipe, steal your ingredients, and spill your cauldron.
